author: dougm
msg: seek is ok if both perl and apr have largefiles enabled

author: dougm
msg: add some MP_LARGE_FILES_ macros that could come in handy

author: dougm
msg: prerequisites comment no longer valid now that we do not support 5.7.x

author: dougm
msg: we cannot support passing Off_t from the perl runtime compiled with
largfile flags into the apr runtime compiled without.
only APR::PerlIO::seek has this issue, problem can be seen failing
apr/perlio tests 3-5 on hpux and solaris, and likely elsewhere.
ok when offset is 0, but nothing else since cast turns it into 0.
